price: Alhamdulillahi! Himdi zote ni za Mwenyezi Mungu aliye nipa juu ya uzee wangu Ismail na Is-haq. Hakika Mola wangu Mlezi ni Mwenye kusikia maombi.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي وَهَبَ لِي عَلَى ٱلۡكِبَرِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَسَمِيعُ ٱلدُّعَآءِ
footnotes: Alhamdulillahi, Himdi zote ni za Mwenyezi Mungu, aliye nipa juu ya kuwa ni mzee wa miaka mingi, na nimekwisha kata tamaa ya kuzaa, Ismail na kisha Is-haq! Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu anasikia na ananipokelea maombi yangu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī wahaba lī ʿalā al-kibari is'māʿīla wa-is'ḥāqa inna rabbī lasamīʿu al-duʿāi
